newsitem.title: USA: Dollar continues steady grind higher at U.S. open.
newsitem.headline: Dollar continues steady grind higher at U.S. open.

text.p: The dollar hit a new 40-month high against the mark overnight and edged higher versus the yen amid steady, if unspectacular buying, traders said.
But a widespread perception that the dollar is fully valued at current levels restrained dollar bulls, and by the start of U.S. trade the greenback had settled back a bit.

"The interesting thing is that the dollar is bid and keeps testing a little bit higher, but there's no sense in the marketplace that it can go much higher," said Richard Vullo, vice president at Bayerische Hypobank.
